name: Pokeyface
description:
Be the best Pokeyface in the world!

Use Pokeys extendable arms to poke baddies in the face before they can reach Pokey.

Controls ControlButtonControllerAttack
W / A / S /D
Left Thumb Stick
RotateSpace(A)
Pause / Menu
ESC
Start

Keys are also rebindable!

Created in April / March 2022 for funsies.

Made with: - Unity - Blender - Ableton Live

Packages Used: - Bezier Path Creator - DOTween Pro - Ultimate Sound FX Bundle

Music by Dead Finks
